summary: 1991  was a common year starting on Tuesday of the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Willem Jacob "Molly" Geertsema  was a Dutch politician. He was born in Utrecht to a political family, and first entered national politics in the Netherlands at the general election of 1959. He was mayor of Warffum and Wassenaar and died there.
title: Molly Geertsema
